name: Desparonia
description:
It's almost the end of the world. Most people have already accepted the fate. You are a different one. You search for the last bit of light which is nothing but a myth now.

Desparonia is a slow-paced narrative game (visual novel/interactive fiction) about death, existence and the self. This demo only contains the first two scenes of the game.

How to play:

  • Press Space to skip the dialogue.
  • Press W to move your car in the 2nd chapter.
  • The rest is the usual point&click interface.

I will be happy if you can give feedbacks about the game.
